summary: An Alaskan town is in danger of destruction by a mystical snow globe that appears on a family's doorstep, wrapped like a Christmas gift, and causes deadly "natural" disasters in the real world, while simultaneously occurring in the globe.
cast: David Cubitt|Laura Harris|Dylan Matzke|Magda Apanowicz|Jeffrey Ballard|Lorne Cardinal|Michael Hogan|Donavon Stinson|Amitai Marmorstein|Teach Grant|Leanne Lapp|Haig Sutherland|Carolyn Adair|Michele Cummins|Hal Myshrall|Steve Saunders
title: Infierno en la nieve
